quotes.quote: I love the idea of being an Aries.
I'm very Aries - every characteristic, good and the bad.
Aries demands love, for like the infant, without love, Aries dies.
Aries needs a partner willing to set sail at a moment’s notice – impulsive and action-oriented, he prefers not to plan and overthink a situation.
Aries continually needs to be reminded that “if winter comes”….. the miracle of spring cannot be far behind.
This disarming naiveté is also why Aries people are so fearless.
Aries anger flashes forth with the speed of sound, but it’s usually gone before the victim knows what it’s all about, and the happy, child-like smile quickly returns.
Aries often defies emotional description. No one can show such tough, forceful behavior.
Aries are independent and love their freedom, but they do not enjoy being alone.
Aries individuals need to be first, but they will want you to be a passenger on their adventure ride.
Aries represents the East, the Day Forces – which is why most of them fight sleep, tranquility, rest and resignation to Fate with such vigor.
Aries is the firebrand, who forges his way through life with daring, initiative and enterprise, there’s a strange quirk to his bravery.
An Aries must be put first. You will do good to remember this.
He at fit periods walk through Aries, however our earthly motions varies.
To bathe in a particular spot of the ganges, at the time when the sun enters the sign Aries.
Aries greatly altered I have seen the ruined dorata.
Now not remote from Aries in his course called from the quick and vegetating womb of nature green or florid.
And sing their wild notes to the listening waste at last from Aries rolls the bounteous sun.
Tenth of the first, sol into Aries enters and bids defiance to all tedious winters.
Reasons only knew when I talk about it Aries or treasons all renew.	Reasons only knew when I talk about it Aries or treasons all renew.
Yet Aries to be very very ambitious.
Stubborn as an Aries
I play the down low very very incognito Aries is my sign I know that I can rhyme.
The high rise lights read your rights and a downtown storm with Aries rising.
And I tell them cause shawty is the baddest she is flushed and she is Aries.
Aries has a jealous heart.
Save you some embarrassment I'm an Aries and I ain't scared.
Whistle a tune of I gotta see Jane yeah read the stars of an Aries girl wear a crown in another world.
If an Aries hurt you you must deserve it every bit of a dime is worth it.
Play no games Aries women set me on fire.
Rather stack than live charge energy fully charged Aries born in late March.
Said I rage like a fire and I flow like the water ain't no surprise I was born under Aries.
Ain't worth my time, can't compromise no that would be strange I'm still that Aries lady.
Not alone as Aries waits with hate upon his fiery throne.
Aries rules the head and brain and like Ram Arians go into battle headfirst.
If they are convinced they are right which is most of the time, Aries people will express their views in a very colorful manner.
Aries are forever seeking out the unknown and will dash off at a moments notice if something interesting is happening at the other end of the world.
Aries woman looks for strength and willpower in a man.
Aries in his many fits knows no favorites.
What an Aries wants, an Aries gets.
You're passionate, energetic and forceful, so your star sign Aries says, so have a fun packed birthday, all our love is sent your way.
If you have a connection you'll know it immediately because an Aries is either into you in a big way or not at all.
I'm an Aries. I need everybody to like me.
An Aries will see through your lies like glass.
I'm probably less volatile and tempestuous than a lot of Aries, but I think I'm probably quite loud and outgoing and passionate. Maybe a bit difficult or stubborn.
I am an Aries. Although I do not believe in astrology, I think this is exactly the right sign to have been born under.
